summary: BASICALLY, THIS VEHICLE HAS HAD SEVERAL ELECTRICAL PROBLEMS SINCE I HAVE OWNED IT ( I AM THE ORIGINAL OWNER).  THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS GO ON INTERMITTENTLY , I HAVE PUT 3 OR 4 NEW BATTERIES IN IT.  THE ALARM SYSTEM DOES NOT FUNCTION PROPERLY.  I HAVE HEARD THE NHTSA IS INVESTIGATING THE AIR BAG, HORN AND CRUISE CONTROL PROBLEM.  HAS ANY DECISIONS BEEN MADE SO THAT I WONT  HAVE TO PAY $300.00 TO FIX THIS DEFECT.   *JB    ****DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS****770839
